review.title: Quick Access to East Bay
review.reviewText: The hotel is nice.  It gives you great access to the East Bay without a lot of traffic since it is so close to the Richmond Bridge.

review.title: nice hotel away from crazy city
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice. Got to our hotel late at night looked for the tv remote couldn't find one. Waited until morning to tell front desk. There was nothing by the phone on how to call the desk. So I went down stairs to tell them we had no remote. They had a drawer of remotes. Breakfast is packaged oatmeal, coffee, packaged muffins. Pool area could have been cleaner, found hair in pool. Gross. Liked that there was no maids coming into our room. Just brought towels to front desk for clean ones. Hotel location was nice because it was off the highway, but the area was run down except for the nice target.
review.locationRemarks: Not much in the area but away from crazy city

review.title: No coffee pots in the room. Entrance doors closed
review.reviewText: No nearby restaurants . I had to knock on entrance door upon checking in at 8:00 in the evening. Had to request a coffee pot. Under the bed looked like it had not been cleaned in a long time

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay.  We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that you felt our grab-and-go breakfast was basic. I discussed your comments with our team, and we are going to make sure all guest know we offer pots/pans and dishes at the desk at anytime during there stay. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I would be happy to speak with you further. We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.reviewText: Could hear Road As if open windows and basic breakfast.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. It's great to hear that the staff at front desk was very helpful. Thank you again for your kind words. The staff and I would love to provide you with another comfortable stay in the future.

review.title: Nice hotel.  Continental breakfast was a joke.
review.reviewText: Super helpful staff at front desk. Lady in the morning was a little overwhelmed as was a lite bit sarcastic.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property. I truly appreciate your comments regarding the helpful staff, spacious room, shower area and price, but  I am disappointed that you felt our location was inconvenient.  Thank you again for sharing your comments with us. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

review.title: To get the space you pay with location
review.reviewText:
It's better value in terms of room size and comfort to make a booking outside San Fran, but San Rafael is not a great base for exploration, if you're not driving that is. The hotel is within sight and earshot of busy motorways, making it feel like a motel, a stop-over. In fact, it's a comfortable place with pool and laundry room and whatever, but so what when it takes 2 hours to get to San Francisco? You have to catch a bus into San Rafael (or walk 45mins!) and then another to go to San Francisco. And each bus seems to come once an hour! Matching the bus which will get you back from San Rafael to the hotel is a matter requiring careful research, because nobody walks in America! 

Room cleaning was but once a week (they failed to remove our box of recycling) and WIFI unsecured, but all the same, the staff were friendly and helpful, the coffee and muffins - though very basic - were as fine a way to breakFAST! as one could wish, and there's a lovely bayside walk in 5-10 mins walk, and the San Rafael bus depot can get you into the swelteirng wine country.
review.positiveRemarks: Helpful staff, spacious room, shower area and price for all that.
review.negativeRemarks: The toilets were weird - shallow bowl, water very close to one's botty - and the annnoying location, too far even from the town centre. More brekkie!
review.locationRemarks: San Rafael has a Mission (one of the 21 pioneering church missions in CA) and a nice Puerto Rican restaurant, Sole Foods (?). Not much.

managementResponses.response: Your review for our hotel was recently brought to my attention.   We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that you were not really informed that the reason why the dishes are not in room is for them to be fresh for you.  Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will continue to tell our guest at check in to make sure your experience is not repeated.  The staff and I appreciate your comments, as it will only help us to improve.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Roof over your head no extras
review.reviewText: This was only hotel available in the area at time of our stay. It is serviceable no extras including housekeeping. iIf you wanted fresh towels you had to exchange at the front desk. The same with pots, pans, or dishes you had to get from front my desk as well. Grab and go breakfast included coffee, prepackaged muffins and granola bars, and fresh apples and oranges. The front desk staff was friendly and accommodating.

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that we didn't inform you at check in, that we do have the dishes at the front desk clean and fresh and ready anytime you would like them. I discussed your comments with the team, and we are going to make sure, we keep letting guest know of the dishes at the front desk. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in town.

review.title: Not bad
review.reviewText: Clean and nice view, but I hated the way the hotel works, you have to ask them for cups, coffee maker or anything that should be already in the room.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. We are disappointed that parking is difficult when it's late, but are pleased that the convenient location best suited your needs. The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Clean hotel  staff very helpful
review.reviewText: Hotel in a quiet location. Very good for an extended stay hotel. Easy access to freeway. Guest parking at times difficult because of trucks parked by other guests. But overall descent.
review.negativeRemarks: Parking can be challenging if you arrive late.
review.locationRemarks: Close to San Francisco so lots ti do. Driving distance to Napa and other attractions.

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you bringing your experience to our attention.  Please accept our most sincere apologies that we were unable to meet your expectations.   As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that I have coached our front desk staff on the importance of providing each guest with professional customer service and I will make sure we are implementing preventative maintenance procedures.  Our team is committed to satisfying our guests, so we are very thankful for your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Cheaply Constructed Room, Poor Continental Breakfa
review.reviewText: Disappointed in the room because of the low quality materials used in construction of the room - fake granite counter tops, fake wood linoleum floor not real wood, furniture appeared to be made of pressed particle board not real wood, low standard carpet in bedroom area that retained dirt stains, thin glass shower stall door that was bowed so leaked water onto floor, bathroom floor linoleum curling at the edges because of excess water from shower, bathroom mirror was small to save money, light-weight lamps that were difficult to turn on by pushbutton because they slid when button was pushed, small, thin towels not thick or luxurious, thin sheets and pillow cases, small TV to save money.  Also disappointed in the room because of the room condition - refrigerator was dented in several places, lamp shades were torn, front door did not fully shut to lock position had to manually pull door shut to lock.  Disappointed in the parking - not enough parking spaces, all parking spaces taken on Saturday night, had to park in front of lobby door.  Disappointed in the continental breakfast - RV parks offer better.  Will never stay here again.  Will never recommend to relatives or friends.
review.positiveRemarks: Some of the staff were friendly - maintenance man was friendly and three of the front lobby staff were friendly.  Three lobby staff were unfriendly.
review.negativeRemarks: Recommend to prospective clients that if they want a quality experience to book at Embassy Suites or Sheraton.
review.locationRemarks: Location in industrial zone so not scenic. Located next to Hwy 580 so on off is easy but freeway noise is bothersome.  Home Depot is nearby.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  It’s great to read that you enjoyed all of the convenient amenities our hotel has to offer as well as our friendly customer service.  I will be sure to share your wonderful feedback with the entire team!  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.reviewText: I stayed there as I planned to travel to San Fransisco the next day. I did not realize that crossing the Golden Gate bridge from North to South required tolls. But I like everything else about the hotel. The staff are really nice. The hotel provides pans and plates etc, and it has laundry rooms as well. The breakfast was pretty good too.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am thrilled that we were able to accommodate your needs with a home away from home experience!  I’m glad that you enjoyed our fully equipped kitchens as well as our convenient location.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.title: Perfect for our needs
review.reviewText: Very comfortable and located in a perfect spot. Safeway close and shopping

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write such a positive review of your stay with us.  We appreciate you letting us know that our housekeeping polices were not to your expectations.  We are sorry for this issue, but are so pleased to read that we were able to exceed your expectations and provide you with a wonderful stay overall.  I’m thrilled that you found our hotel to be a great value!  Thank you again for your review.  It would be our pleasure for you to repeat your experience with us in the future.

review.title: Great Place to stay!
review.reviewText: We typically pay $250 or more a night in San Francisco with obscene parking fees that do not have in and out privileges and at minimum $15,00 for wifi, and the business office fees are high. This hotel/extended stay is approximately 35 min. from SF (with light traffic). The location is  great, free wifi, no parking fees, located close to many stores and restaurants and it is an all around great stay. We never expected to like the hotel and chose it because we knew we would be spending very little time there and we found we liked it better than the hotels where we typically stay in SF. There is a full refrigerator, microwave, great view of the water, the beds were very comfortable and they have (free continental breakfast) excellent coffee brewing, hot tea, water for oatmeal, oranges, apples, muffins and breakfast bars at not cost from 6:00 a.m. - 9:30 a.m. The facility is not fancy but it is very clean and instead of having a $1000.00+ bill for three days our total bill was $315! There is housekeeping only if you stay eight or more days and you have to turn towels into the front for new supplies/towels, and although we had never been without housekeeping on a daily basis we found we liked the privacy. Getting towels was a a first for us but for the price, it was fine..
review.negativeRemarks: Costco muffins would have been better than the little no flavor muffins.

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize for the room conditions you experienced.  To make sure this doesn't happen again, I will closely inspect our rooms with our maintenance engineer to ensure that they meet our company’s high standards.  Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Plumbing issues
review.reviewText: We've stayed here for many years during our annual inventory.  Every year the hotel gets slightly worse.  This time around we noticed the bathroom sink drained slowly.  Then we took a shower and the shower water would not drain!  Plus there was a ring of mold around the shower pan.  No heating or AC either.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  Please accept our apologies that your stay was not to our company’s high standards.  While we no longer keep dishes in guest rooms, these items are available upon request at the front desk.  In response to your feedback, I will make sure we are clearly communicating our amenities during guest arrivals as well as frequently walking our property.  I will also make sure we are better monitoring our room inventory.  Thanks to your feedback, we can continue to work on providing an exceptional stay for all of our guests.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Up for a dance competition
review.reviewText: Hmnnn well the first room we didn't even get to the door as there was a loud barking dog next door , nope! Then the 2nd room only had one bed when we booked 2 queens for 4 of us. The third room was fine but really disappointed there wasn't even a cofee maker. The guy working was very nice. Trash outside when we first walked in was overflowing. Overall it was OK.  Would pay a bit more for something a bit nicer with full breakfast and a coffee pot!

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I’m thrilled that we were able to provide you with a comfortable stay and exceptional customer service!  It’s great to read that you enjoyed all of the amenities our hotel has to offer.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Nice stay
review.reviewText: The hotel staff was very friendly the pool was nice my room was very comfortable eay to get to 101 very happy with my stay there

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  It’s great to read that we were able to accommodate your needs with a satisfactory stay.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding our fitness area and comfortable beds.  Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.  We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Adequate
review.reviewText: Clean and decent fitness room.  Comfy bed. Only 1 person at desk sp long checkin.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for posting a review of our property.  I’m so pleased to read that you had a great stay at our hotel!  I truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our friendly staff and comfortable rooms.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.title: Nice place to stay for the price
review.reviewText: The room, overall, was comfortable. The staff was friendly and available when we needed them. The AC/heating unit was a bit noisy, but only noticeable at night when we were trying to sleep. The price was reasonable, especially when compared to staying in San Fransisco. I would use this hotel again.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  Please accept our apologies that your stay was not to our company’s high standards.  In response to your feedback, we will continue to strive to provide each guest with a comfortable room and professional customer service.  Thanks to your feedback, we can continue to work on providing an exceptional stay for all of our guests.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Last Resort
review.reviewText: Since the super bowl was in the area, hotels were difficult to find and this was a choice of last resort.  It was in an industrial/car maintenance area that had no restaurants or shops nearby.
review.locationRemarks: See above.  Nothing to do nearby.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  The maintenance and service issues you described are unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience.  Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will make sure we are responding to guest needs in a timely manner as well as closely inspecting rooms.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in town.

review.reviewText:
Things in several areas were in disrepair.
No one to talk to or call until my departure
Room rate was very high for the condition of the facility and the services offered.
review.positiveRemarks:
proximity to where I needed to be
Room was large. Furnishings were moderate but adequate.
review.negativeRemarks:
Staff at check in was nearly non existent
Took me 15 minutes to find anyone to check me in at 8:30 p.m.
